price: 6. O mens! Wat heeft jou onachtzaam gemaakt over jullie Heer, de meest Edele.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ ٱلۡكَرِيمِ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-insānu mā gharraka birabbika al-karīmi
